The debate was passionate- and in one instance... at variance... with all the talk about new civility: On Jan. 19, the Republican-controlled House voted 245 to 189 to repeal health care reform. The party line vote capped a vigorous debate in which Republicans vilified the health care law and Democrats exalted it, reports CBS News Congressional correspondent Nancy Cordes . "When you order every American to buy health insurance whether they want it, need it or not, that's a government takeover of healthcare," said Nancy Pelosi Mike Pence , R-Indiana, on the floor.
